text: Ezɨ Noa uaghan kamaghɨra nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti. Ezɨ God bizir gɨn otivamibar gun a mɨkeme. Kar bizir Noa tɨghar ganamiba. Egha a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn akamɨn ikia, egha bizir kam bagha a kurir mamɨn ingari. Egha uan amuiroghboriba ko, me kurimɨn aven ghuzɨ bizitam me gasɨghasɨzir pu, ezɨ me deravɨra iti. Ezɨ Noan nɨghnɨzir gavgavir kam, a nguazimɨn itir gumazamizir igharaziba bar, men arazir kuraba da aghurigha azenim gatɨ. Noa nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itima, God bizir kamɨn a mɨgɨa ghaze, a nan damazimɨn bar gumazir aghuim. Ezɨ God bar gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itiba, a bar kamaghɨn me gami.
